#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;

int N;

void solve()
{
    scanf("%d", &N);
    float res = N;
    int i=2;
    int n= N;
    while(N>1 && i<=n)
    {
        if((N%i)== 0)
        {
            while((N%i) == 0)
            {
                N/= i;
            }
            res*=(1-(1.0/i));
        }
        i++;
    }
    int ans = res;
    printf("%d\n", ans);
}

int main()
{
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    //freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
   // freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
    #endif
    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);

    while(t--)
    {
        solve();
    }
}
